Interface UserControlInterface

    • setCampCommittee

      boolean setCampCommittee(String userid, int campid)
      Tags a User to a Camp object's committee HashMap attribute Tags a Camp to a Student object's campCommittee int attribute
      Parameters:
      userid - the User's ID
      campid - the Camp this User belongs to
      Returns:
      true if the User is successfully added to the Camp, false otherwise
